resources.string: %s will be used by default whenever you perform this action. You can change your default app in Settings > Apps > Default apps.
This device doesn’t support this %s. Tap to set up in a supported format.
Swipe from the bottom of the phone to show the Home, Back, and Recents buttons.
"You can use the Home button even while it's hidden. Hard press the bottom center of your phone to go to the Home screen."
"You're using full screen mode. The Home, Back, and Recents buttons are hidden to minimize visual distractions and to prevent you from leaving the app accidentally."
You can show the buttons again by swiping inward from the edge of the screen where the buttons normally appear.
After a while, the buttons will disappear again.
"You can use the Home button even while it's hidden. To go to the Home screen, hard press the area of the screen where the Home button normally appears."

"However you're holding your phone, the buttons will always be located next to the charging port. When your phone is rotated counterclockwise, swipe left from the edge of the screen as shown by the arrow."
"However you're holding your phone, the buttons will always be located next to the charging port. When your phone is rotated clockwise, swipe right from the edge of the screen as shown by the arrow."
To unpin an app, press and hold the Recents and Back keys at the same time.
Security policy restricts use of clipboard.
Your phone is overheating. Close this app immediately. %s will be closed automatically in 1 minute, and any unsaved data will be lost.
%1$s closed. Your phone is overheating. Try using %2$s again after your phone cools down.
"Can't install the app. It is not optimized for use with %s."
%1$s will be used by default whenever you perform this action. You can change your default app in %2$s Settings > Apps > More options button > Default apps.
Unable to enable %1$s. %2$s is not available with your internet package or no response was received from the %3$s server.
Device storage low (tap here to view related settings)
Battery power low (tap here to enable Power saving mode)
Turn off Mute all sounds in Accessibility settings to change the volume.
Selected app was uninstalled. %s turned off.
%s sound is playing on a Bluetooth audio device. Tap here to turn this off.
%s sound is playing through your phone speaker. Tap here to turn this off.
%s sound is playing through your headphones. Tap here to turn this off.
%s sound is playing through your USB audio device. Tap here to turn this off.

The audio device you selected for this app is the same as the current audio output device for your phone. To separate the sound for this app, change your audio output device in the quick settings panel.
The audio device you selected for this app (%1$s) is the same as the main audio output device (%2$s). To separate sound for this app, the main audio output device needs to be changed to %3$s.
"Can't use Bixby while Maximum power saving mode is on."
"Can't use Bixby while connected to DeX Station."
You can change the app aspect ratio on the Recent apps screen.
To return to the previous aspect ratio, go to Settings > Display > Full screen apps.
Tap here to fill the entire screen
Bixby unavailable. Only phone owner or main phone number can use Bixby.
Configure device settings, such as Bluetooth, Location, Wi-Fi, Mobile data, and Android settings.
Configure system settings, such as Auto rotate screen, Multi window, notifications, and the device volume.
Control the device in Sealed mode.
Lock down the device to provide access to only one or a few apps and disable the status bar.
Enter pass code to exit ProKiosk mode.
Security policy blocks use of this Wi-Fi network.
Security policy prevents use of Wi-Fi.
Security policy prevents use of unsecure Wi-Fi networks.
Security policy prevents addition of Wi-Fi networks.
Install, uninstall, disable, enable, and query app state. Restrict ability to install or uninstall specific apps.
Back up and restore application data.
Remove or roll back permissions for one or more apps.
Monitor and query the device status and data
Create, modify, and delete Exchange ActiveSync account settings.
Restrict the use of roaming networks.
Create, modify, and delete Wi-Fi profiles.
Install certificates, encrypt the device, remove selected data from the device, and wipe the device.
Restrict access to various hardware features.
Restrict access to various software features and services.
Restrict the use of location services.
Create, modify, configure, and delete IMAP/POP email accounts.
Create, modify, and delete VPN settings and profiles
Create, modify, and delete network profiles.
Control call and SMS functionality based on usage
Configure browser settings and restrict changes
Configure and restrict browser proxy settings.
Specify and query the device date and time. Modify the date and time format.
Create, modify, and delete VPN profiles for the Mocana VPN client.
Create, modify, and delete Knox VPN profiles for non-Workspace traffic.
Create, modify, and delete VPN profiles for Knox Workspace traffic.
Control network traffic on your device to enable VPN tunnels, network content filtering, or network threat detection and analysis.
Control enterprise policies on the device.
View device screen remotely and share key, touch, and trackball events with the device user.
Lock down the device to restrict access to only approved apps.
Configure Enterprise SSO settings in Knox mode
Allow the application to configure Enterprise SSO settings and delete SSO tokens in Knox mode.
Create, edit, and delete Knox Workspace and associated user accounts
Allow administrator to perform integrity management.
Connect and disconnect encrypted storage APIs.
Allow administrators to create audit logs.
Allow administrator to set up SEAndroid
Control the SEAndroid behaviour of your device via the context and policy files.
Manage root CA (certificate authorities) used for certificate validation.
Create, query, and delete directory services (LDAP) accounts.
Configure dual SIM card device policy
Force calls, data, and SMS/MMS on dual SIM devices to go through a corporate SIM card.
This application can access MDM content providers.
Create, activate, and delete virtual perimeter (geofence) configurations.
Enable, disable, and manage multi-user capability.
Collect device data to analyze device performance and user behaviour.
Update and enable Bluetooth secure mode.
Verify the integrity of the device firmware data.
Set data sharing restrictions for Knox Workspace
Configure which Knox Workspace data can be synced and shared with apps outside of the Workspace.
Allows the app to communicate with Enterprise VPN solution services (which communicate with third-party VPN vendors).
Send intents and requests to Enterprise VPN solution services.
Allow the application to configure Enterprise SSO settings and delete SSO tokens.
Allow the application to set Enterprise proxy credentials.
The administrator can control the advanced restriction of software features and services in Knox.
Use services for the storage and retrieval of digital certificates.
Universal Credential Management for eSE Storage
Manage eSE Storage using Universal Credential Management.
Universal Credential Management for third-party storage
Manage third-party storage using Universal Credential Management.
Work with third-party credential storage plug-ins.
Use KeyStore to generate and maintain secure cryptographic keys.
Create and manage SEAMS (SE for Android Management Service) containers. Manage SE for Android settings and log behaviour.
Allow the application to access SEAMS SE policy APIs.
Allow and deny permissions for the use of hardware and functions such as Wi-Fi and Bluetooth from within Knox mode.
Enable control access cards (SmartCards) to authenticate users who access apps such as browsers and email clients.
Allow the application to collect device management API usage statistics.
Customize the lock screen, wallpaper, and emergency call settings.
THIS DEVICE IS THE PROPERTY OF
Configure Enterprise DLP settings in Knox mode
Allow the application to configure Enterprise DLP settings in Knox mode.
Allow the application to control encryption of its data using advanced Knox encryption features.

The Knox security policy restricts this action.
Security policy prevents use of this hardware key.
Security policy restricts you from changing wallpaper.
Security policy prevents using task manager.
Security policy restricts you from stopping this application.
Security policy restricts clearing of application data.
"Security policy restricts clearing of this app's cache."
Security policy restricts you from loading this URL.
Security policy prevents status bar expansion.
Security policy prevents use of NFC.
Security policy prevents multiple user capability on your device.
Security policy prevents creation of new user accounts on your device.
Security policy prevents removal of user accounts from your device.
Security policy prevents use of home key.
Security policy prevents removal of this account.
Security policy prevents addition of this account.
Security policy prevents use of USB host storage.
Security policy prevents Multi window function.
Security policy prevents changing keyboard settings.
Security policy prevents the enabling of Flight mode.
Security policy prevents installation of this application.
Security policy prevents updating this application.
Security policy prevents use of this certificate.
Digital signature not valid for user %d
Security policy prevents use of unsecured tethering for hotspot.
The subject of the new certificate does not match that of the old.
Unable to check if certificate has been revoked.
Security policy prevents use of Bluetooth.

Security policy prevents use of Bluetooth media audio.
Security policy prevents use of Bluetooth headset.
Security policy prevents the use of Bluetooth hands-free.
Security policy prevents use of Bluetooth audio/video control.
Security policy prevents use of Bluetooth dial-up networking.
Security policy prevents file browsing via Bluetooth.
Security policy prevents use of Bluetooth via all serial ports.
Security policy prevents your SIM card from being accessed via Bluetooth.
Security policy prevents printing via Bluetooth.
Security policy prevents connecting to your desktop via Bluetooth.
Security policy prevents pairing with this Bluetooth device.
Security policy prevents making of outgoing calls via Bluetooth.
Security policy prevents data transfers via Bluetooth.

Security policy prevents use of Wi-Fi tethering.
The security policy restricts the use of mobile data.
Security policy prevents use of USB mass storage.
Security policy prevents use of camera.
Security policy prevents use of iris camera.
Security policy prevents use of the microphone.
Security policy prevents use of screen capture.
Security policy prevents use of Bluetooth tethering.

The security policy requires you to change your password.

Security policy prevents editing SIM card contacts.
Security policy prevents changing Developer mode settings.
Security policy restricts firmware auto update.
Security policy prevents enabling of reactivation lock.
Security policy prevents use of headphones.
Security policy prevents moving content to SD card.
Security policy restricts changes in Always on configuration.
Security policy restricts changes on VPN profiles.
Security policy restricts creation of VPN profiles.
Security policy prevents use of Easy clip.
Your administrator will restart your device.
Another app set as default by device administrator.
Please check your network connection and try again.
Allow additional functions for the recents key.
Manage the settings for automatic security policy updates.
The administrator can configure and restrict global proxy settings.

"Smart network switch added %s to the most frequently used Wi-Fi networks. When it's detected, Wi-Fi will be turned on automatically. To turn off this function, go to Wi-Fi > ADVANCED > Smart network switch."
"Smart network switch deleted %s from the most frequently used Wi-Fi networks. It can be added back if it's used more frequently."
"Charging… USB functions may be restricted while Maximum power saving mode is on."
Too many files have been created on your phone. Apps may stop working correctly and your phone may no longer start up. Back up any important data and factory reset your phone.
